title: The Adventures of Spot
brief_description: Contains 7 stories about Spot: 1. Sweet Dreams Spot! 2. Spot goes to School. 3. Spot goes to the circus. 4. Spot follows his nose. 5. Spot goes Splash. 6. Spot’s Windy Day. 7. Spot goes on Holiday. Rated: G
